cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Beloved, versatile Blom vehicle that beat out every other one in its class after a series of rigorous tests.
The little engine that could. Still kicking after being gifted around the extended family four times.
